settings.html: Radiologists experience unparalleled PACS performance with the HP Z8 G4 Workstation. Custom-designed for the intricacies of advanced imaging, the HP Z8 G4 flawlessly partners with PACS systems, presenting an unparalleled diagnostic viewing experience marked by precision and depth. The HP Z8 G4 workstation is a powerful and dependable computing solution, tailored to meet the specific needs of healthcare professionals, including radiologists. Carefully designed to deliver solid performance and speed, it ensures quick and efficient access to radiology images. This streamlined workflow allows healthcare professionals to read and diagnose more efficiently, ultimately contributing to improved patient care.

settings.title: Reliable Processing Power
settings.description: These processors are well-suited for healthcare professionals, particularly radiologists, who require robust and reliable performance. Whether you opt for the Xeon Silver or Xeon Gold or Xeon Platinum, you can expect seamless multitasking, efficient data management, and accelerated image processing capabilities. At monitors.com, we're committed to delivering great value to our customers, and these processor options are a testament to our dedication. Our focus is on providing healthcare professionals with dependable workstations that meet their specific needs, ensuring that your investment is worthwhile and aligned with your expectations. Choose the HP Z8 G4 Workstation for the peace of mind that comes with trusted processor performance and the added value of monitors.com.

settings.title: Robust Reliability
settings.description: Built on a foundation of reliability, the HP Z8 G4 workstation features a tested and trusted design tailored to endure the challenges prevalent in healthcare environments. Whether tasked with safeguarding critical patient data or ensuring uninterrupted image processing, this workstation consistently delivers dependable performance, minimizing downtime and alleviating maintenance concerns. Its proven durability and robust performance make it an ideal choice for healthcare professionals who demand a reliable computing solution. Trust in the HP Z8 G4 to meet the stringent demands of healthcare tasks, providing a steadfast and dependable platform for critical applications in medical settings, ultimately ensuring a seamless and efficient workflow.

settings.title: Powerful Performance
settings.description: Harnessing the power of a dual-processor architecture, the HP Z8 G4 delivers a substantial computing punch. Whether processing intricate medical images or running resource-intensive healthcare applications, this workstation excels without breaking a sweat. Its Intel Xeon processors guarantee dependable performance, ensuring efficiency and productivity enhancements for years to come. The dual-processor setup significantly boosts computational capabilities, making the HP Z8 G4 an ideal choice for demanding tasks in healthcare environments. Trust in its processing prowess to handle complex workloads effortlessly, providing the performance and reliability needed for critical medical imaging and healthcare applications.

settings.title: Next-Generation Acoustics and Thermals
settings.description: Crafted with next-generation acoustics and thermals in mind, the HP Z8 G4 ensures a quiet and cool working environment for radiologists. This design consideration allows professionals to focus on their tasks without the distraction of excessive noise or concerns about overheating, promoting a comfortable and efficient workflow. The workstation's commitment to providing a conducive working environment aligns with the demands of radiologists who require a quiet and cool setup for precise and concentrated medical imaging tasks. The HP Z8 G4 stands as a reliable companion, delivering both performance and a comfortable workspace for professionals in the field of medical imaging.

settings.title: Internal View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
8. 24 DIMM Slots for DDR4 ECC Memory
9. 2 External 5.25” Bays and Slimline Optical
10. 4 Internal 3.5” Bays
11. 2 Intel Xeon Processors (Skylake SP) family
12. Slots:
Slot 1: PCIe Gen3 x4 – Transforms to PCIe Gen3 x8 when 2nd CPU is installed 
Slot 2: PCIe Gen3 x16
Slot 3: PCIe Gen3 x16 – Available ONLY when 2nd processor is installed
Slot 4: PCIe Gen3 x16
Slot 5: PCIe Gen3 x4
Slot 6: PCIe Gen3 x16 - Available ONLY when 2nd processor is installed
Slot 7: PCIe Gen3 x4 
13. 2 sSATA, 8 SATA (AHCI) Ports
14. 3 USB 2.0 Internal Ports, 1 USB 3.0 Gen1 Internal Port

settings.title: Versatile Expansion with 7 PCIe Slots
settings.description: With 7 PCIe slots, the workstation provides ample expansion options for healthcare professionals, allowing customization with additional cards for specialized tasks or future upgrades. This flexibility ensures the system adapts to changing needs while maintaining performance and reliability. Whether integrating extra graphics cards, storage, or other hardware, the workstation remains versatile and future-proof, accommodating the dynamic demands of healthcare environments.

settings.title: HP Anywhere for Enhanced Mobility
settings.description: HP Anywhere provides remote access to essential applications and data, enabling healthcare professionals to work flexibly from any location. It ensures seamless access to patient information and medical records, improving workflow efficiency and mobility. Secure connections to critical systems support collaboration and informed decision-making, enhancing agility and adaptability in dynamic healthcare environments.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The HP Z8 G4 Workstation Tower features a compact design, measuring efficiently, with dimensions and weight optimized for workspace versatility.

  1. Height: 17.5" (445 mm)
  2. Width: 8.5" (216 mm)
  3. Depth: 21.7" (552 mm)

    Weight: 49.8 lbs (22.6 kg)

settings.title: Seamless Multitasking
settings.description: The HP Z8 G4, designed for seamless multitasking, provides substantial RAM options to enhance performance. Supporting up to 3TB of DDR4 ECC RAM, this workstation offers ample memory for radiologists. With such capacity, radiologists can efficiently work with large datasets, manipulate multiple images simultaneously, and run memory-intensive applications without encountering slowdowns or hiccups. The abundant RAM ensures a fluid and efficient workflow, allowing professionals to tackle complex medical imaging tasks with ease. The HP Z8 G4's robust memory capabilities contribute to a responsive and productive computing experience, addressing the specific needs of radiologists dealing with resource-intensive applications in medical imaging.

settings.title: Enhanced Concentration with Whisper-Quiet Acoustics
settings.description: The whisper-quiet acoustics of the HP Z8 G4 create an unobtrusive presence in your workspace. Radiologists can work in a peaceful environment without the distraction of loud fans or cooling systems, promoting concentration and focus. The workstation's commitment to low-noise operation aligns with the needs of professionals in tasks requiring precision and concentration, such as medical imaging. With the HP Z8 G4, the emphasis on a quiet working environment enhances the overall experience for radiologists, allowing them to engage in their critical tasks with heightened concentration and reduced distractions. The workstation's unobtrusive acoustics contribute to a conducive workspace, supporting the demands of professionals in healthcare environments.

7. 1 Headset

settings.title: Rear View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
15. Choice of 1125W or 1450W, 90% Efficient Power Supplies 

16. Rear I/O:

Rear Power Button

  • 6USB 3.1 Gen1 (x6)
  • Serial (x1)

settings.content: Designed to meet the demands of radiologists working with intricate medical images, the HP Z8 G4 workstation supports up to four high-end GPUs. This unique feature empowers radiologists with unparalleled image rendering and analysis capabilities, ensuring that every detail is captured accurately. The ability to integrate multiple high-end GPUs enhances the workstation's processing power, enabling it to handle complex medical imaging tasks with precision. Radiologists can rely on the HP Z8 G4 to deliver exceptional performance, providing the tools needed for in-depth analysis and more confident diagnoses in the field of medical imaging.

This adaptability ensures that the workstation can evolve with changing needs without compromising on performance or reliability. The flexibility provided by the PCIe slots allows healthcare professionals to tailor their workstation to meet specific requirements, whether it's integrating additional graphics cards, storage solutions, or other specialized hardware. This feature ensures seamless access to patient information and medical records, enhancing the efficiency and mobility of healthcare workflows. With HP Anywhere, professionals can securely connect to essential systems, enabling them to make informed decisions and collaborate with colleagues, even when away from the primary workspace. The remote access capabilities contribute to the agility and adaptability required in dynamic healthcare environments, ensuring that critical information is readily available to support timely and informed decision-making processes.

settings.title: Monitors.com Exclusive Offer
settings.content:
When you purchase from Monitors.com, you not only receive a top-tier workstation but also benefit from our dedication to value and service. We understand the unique needs of healthcare professionals, and that's why we offer:
Advanced Hot Swap: Our Hot Swap capabilities ensure you can seamlessly switch out components without workflow disruption, guaranteeing uninterrupted productivity.

Next Business Day Standard Replacement: Count on our swift replacement service to keep your workstation running smoothly, minimizing downtime.

Free Shipping & Fast Delivery: We respect your time, offering free shipping and lightning-fast delivery to get you started with your workstation without delay.

Dedicated Support Team: Our team of experts is readily available to address any inquiries or issues, making your journey from purchase to setup as seamless as possible.

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.
